temperature_basic.name: temperature_basic
temperature_basic.expression: clamp(sea_level_temperature + var('control:temperature:bias') + quick_multioctave_noise{x = x,y = y,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = 5,octaves = 4,input_scale = var('control:temperature:frequency') / 32,output_scale = 1/20,offset_x = 40000 / var('control:temperature:frequency'),octave_output_scale_multiplier = 3,octave_input_scale_multiplier = 1/3},-20, 50)

cliffiness_basic.name: cliffiness_basic
cliffiness_basic.expression: clamp(0.5 * log2(cliff_richness) + quick_multioctave_noise{x = x,y = y,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = 123,input_scale = 1/32,output_scale = 1,octaves = 2,octave_output_scale_multiplier = 1,octave_input_scale_multiplier = 1/3},0, 1) + 0.5

nauvis_detail.name: nauvis_detail
nauvis_detail.expression: variable_persistence_multioctave_noise{x = x,y = y,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = 600,input_scale = nauvis_segmentation_multiplier / 14,output_scale = 0.03,offset_x = 10000 / nauvis_segmentation_multiplier,octaves = 5,persistence = nauvis_persistance}

nauvis_hills_offset.name: nauvis_hills_offset
nauvis_hills_offset.expression: abs(multioctave_noise{x = x + 12 * nauvis_hills_offset_normalized_x,y = y + 12 * nauvis_hills_offset_normalized_y,persistence = 0.5,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = 900,octaves = 4,input_scale = nauvis_segmentation_multiplier / 90})

nauvis_macro.name: nauvis_macro
nauvis_macro.expression: multioctave_noise{x = x,y = y,persistence = 0.6,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = 1000,octaves = 2,input_scale = nauvis_segmentation_multiplier / 1600}* max(0, multioctave_noise{x = x,y = y,persistence = 0.6,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = 1100,octaves = 1,input_scale = nauvis_segmentation_multiplier / 1600})

distance.name: distance

tree_dead_grey_trunk.name: tree_dead_grey_trunk

tree_dry.name: tree_dry
tree_dry.expression: 0.2 * max(tree_01,  tree_09, tree_09_brown, tree_09_red) * clamp(1 - tree_small_noise, 0, 2)

tree_dead_desert.name: tree_dead_desert
tree_dead_desert.expression: 0.2 * max(tree_08, tree_08_brown, tree_08_red, tree_08_extended, desert) * clamp(1 - tree_small_noise, 0, 2)

local_expressions.tree_08_extended: min(0.1, trees_forest_path_cutout_faded,min(0,asymmetric_ramps{input=temperature, from_bottom=13, from_top=14, to_top=16, to_bottom=17},asymmetric_ramps{input=moisture, from_bottom=0.05, from_top=0.15, to_top=0.3, to_bottom=0.4})+ (min(0, distance/20 - 3) - 0.5 + 0.2 * control:trees:size)+ tree_noise)
local_expressions.desert: min(0.1,trees_forest_path_cutout_faded,min(0, asymmetric_ramps{input=moisture, from_bottom=-0.2, from_top=-0.1, to_top=0.1, to_bottom=0.2})+ (min(0, distance/20 - 3) - 0.5 + 0.2 * control:trees:size)+ min(tree_noise, desert_noise + 0.2))

enemy_base_probability.name: enemy_base_probability

blob.expression: basis_noise{x = x, y = y, seed0 = map_seed, seed1 = 123, input_scale = input_scale, output_scale = output_scale}

decorative_knockout.name: decorative_knockout
decorative_knockout.expression: multioctave_noise{x = x, y = y, persistence = 0.7, seed0 = map_seed, seed1 = 1300000, octaves = 2, input_scale = 1/2.5}

gleba_plants_noise.name: gleba_plants_noise

gleba_plants_noise_b.name: gleba_plants_noise_b

lava_hot_basalts_range.name: lava_hot_basalts_range

vulcanus_chimney_truncated.name: vulcanus_chimney_truncated

vulcanus_rock_tiny.name: vulcanus_rock_tiny

vulcanus_temperature.name: vulcanus_temperature

vulcanus_flood_cracks_a.expression: lerp(min(vulcanus_plasma(7543, 2.5 * vulcanus_cracks_scale, 4 * vulcanus_cracks_scale, 0.5, 1),vulcanus_plasma(7443, 1.5 * vulcanus_cracks_scale, 3.5 * vulcanus_cracks_scale, 0.5, 1)),1,clamp(vulcanus_detail_noise(241, 2 * vulcanus_cracks_scale, 2, 0.25), 0, 1))

gleba_tri_ridge.name: gleba_tri_ridge

local_expressions.tri_a: 1 + multioctave_noise{x = wobble_x, y = wobble_y, persistence = 0.65, octaves = 3, input_scale = 1/300*control:gleba_water:frequency, seed0 = map_seed, seed1 = 10000}

local_expressions.tri_c: 1 + multioctave_noise{x = wobble_x, y = wobble_y, persistence = 0.65, octaves = 3, input_scale = 1/300*control:gleba_water:frequency, seed0 = map_seed, seed1 = 30000}

local_expressions.starting_area: max(-30 * clamp(starting_lakes * 2, 0, 1), 5 * min(gleba_starting_lowlands * 2, 1), 130 * min(starting_highlands * 2, 1), 80 * min(starting_midlands * 2, 1), 70 * min((starting_bridges - 0.5) * 3, 1)) + 6 * ridges_small_noise

local_expressions.starting_bridge_b: min(1 - abs(starting_rotated_b_x / gleba_starting_area_multiplier - gleba_starting_direction * sin(starting_rotated_b_y / 64 / gleba_starting_area_multiplier) * 64 * gleba_starting_area_multiplier) / 110, 2 - distance / gleba_starting_area_multiplier / 700)

fulgora_structure_facets.name: fulgora_structure_facets
fulgora_structure_facets.expression: voronoi_facet_noise{x = x,y = y * 0.8,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = 'fulgora_structure_cells',grid_size = fulgora_grid / 8,distance_type = 'minkowski3',jitter = fulgora_structure_jitter}

fulgora_tile_ruin_walls.name: fulgora_tile_ruin_walls
fulgora_tile_ruin_walls.expression: max(fulgora_natural_and_mesa_mask * (2 * fulgora_ruins_walls + fulgora_ruins_paving - 0.5),fulgora_artificial_mask * (0.25 * fulgora_ruins_walls+ 0.25 * fulgora_structure_subnoise- 4 * fulgora_structure_facets- fulgora_road_paving_2c+ 2.5))

fulgora_tile_ruin_conduit.name: fulgora_tile_ruin_conduit
fulgora_tile_ruin_conduit.expression: fulgora_artificial_mask * (fulgora_ruins_walls+ fulgora_structure_subnoise + 2 * fulgora_structure_facets- fulgora_road_paving_2c+ 0.2+ 0.3 * fulgora_vaults_and_starting_vault) - fulgora_road_paving_2c

fulgora_tile_ruin_machinery.name: fulgora_tile_ruin_machinery
fulgora_tile_ruin_machinery.expression: fulgora_artificial_mask * (-fulgora_ruins_walls+ 1.25 * fulgora_structure_subnoise+ 2.5 * fulgora_structure_facets- fulgora_road_paving_2c- 0.2+ 0.3 * fulgora_vaults_and_starting_vault+ 2 * (fulgora_spots_prebanding < 1)) - fulgora_road_paving_2c

aquilo_starting_crude_oil.name: aquilo_starting_crude_oil
aquilo_starting_crude_oil.expression: starting_spot_at_angle{angle = aquilo_angle, distance = 40, radius = aquilo_spot_size * 0.8, x_distortion = 0, y_distortion = 0}

aquilo_starting_lithium_brine.name: aquilo_starting_lithium_brine
aquilo_starting_lithium_brine.expression: starting_spot_at_angle{angle = aquilo_angle + 120, distance = 80, radius = aquilo_spot_size * 0.6, x_distortion = 0, y_distortion = 0}

aquilo_starting_flourine_vent.name: aquilo_starting_flourine_vent
aquilo_starting_flourine_vent.expression: starting_spot_at_angle{angle = aquilo_angle + 240, distance = 160, radius = aquilo_spot_size * 0.6, x_distortion = 0, y_distortion = 0}

aquilo_starting_flourine_vent_tiny.name: aquilo_starting_flourine_vent_tiny
aquilo_starting_flourine_vent_tiny.expression: starting_spot_at_angle{angle = aquilo_angle + 240, distance = 80, radius = 1, x_distortion = 0, y_distortion = 0}

local_expressions.formation_broken: -20+ 8 * max(aquilo_island_peaks * 1.1, min(0., random_island_peaks - 0.2))+ 13 * (pow(voronoi_large * max(0, voronoi_large_cell * 1.2 - 0.2) + 0.5 * voronoi_small * max(0, aux + 0.1), 0.5))
local_expressions.voronoi_large: voronoi_facet_noise{   x = x + aquilo_wobble_x * 2,y = y + aquilo_wobble_y * 2,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = 'aquilo-cracks',grid_size = 24,distance_type = 'euclidean',jitter = 1}
local_expressions.voronoi_large_cell: voronoi_cell_id{  x = x + aquilo_wobble_x * 2,y = y + aquilo_wobble_y * 2,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = 'aquilo-cracks',grid_size = 24,distance_type = 'euclidean',jitter = 1}
local_expressions.voronoi_small: voronoi_facet_noise{   x = x + aquilo_wobble_x * 2,y = y + aquilo_wobble_y * 2,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = 'aquilo-cracks',grid_size = 10,distance_type = 'euclidean',jitter = 1}
local_expressions.tri_crack: min(aquilo_simple_billows{seed1 = 2000, octaves = 3, input_scale = segmentation_mult / 1.5},aquilo_simple_billows{seed1 = 3000, octaves = 3, input_scale = segmentation_mult / 1.2},aquilo_simple_billows{seed1 = 4000, octaves = 3, input_scale = segmentation_mult})

aquilo_aux.name: aquilo_aux
aquilo_aux.expression: 0.5 + multioctave_noise{x = x + aquilo_wobble_x * 300 / aquilo_aux_scale,y = y + aquilo_wobble_y * 300 / aquilo_aux_scale,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = 14243,octaves = 3,persistence = 0.7,input_scale = aquilo_aux_scale / 25,output_scale = 1}

aquilo_high_frequency_peaks.name: aquilo_high_frequency_peaks
aquilo_high_frequency_peaks.expression: abs(multioctave_noise{x = x, y = y, persistence = 0.85, seed0 = map_seed, seed1 = 1, octaves = 3, input_scale = 1/6})

aquilo_snow_ice.name: aquilo_snow_ice
aquilo_snow_ice.expression: multioctave_noise{x = x, y = y, persistence = 0.85, seed0 = map_seed, seed1 = 1, octaves = 3, input_scale = 1/12}

aquilo_tile_variant.name: aquilo_tile_variant
aquilo_tile_variant.expression: multioctave_noise{x = x, y = y, persistence = 0.85, seed0 = map_seed, seed1 = 100, octaves = 3, input_scale = 1/6}

noise_layer_noise.name: noise_layer_noise
noise_layer_noise.expression: multioctave_noise{x = x, y = y, persistence = 0.7, seed0 = map_seed, seed1 = seed, octaves = 4, input_scale = 1/6, output_scale = 2/3}

random.name: random
random.expression: 1 - random_penalty{x = x, y = y, seed = seed, source = 1, amplitude = amplitude}

random_penalty_at.name: random_penalty_at
random_penalty_at.expression: random_penalty{x = x, y = y, seed = seed, source = value, amplitude = value}

random_penalty_between.name: random_penalty_between
random_penalty_between.expression: random_penalty{x = x, y = y, seed = seed, source = to, amplitude = to - from}

random_penalty_inverse.name: random_penalty_inverse
random_penalty_inverse.expression: random_penalty{x = x, y = y, seed = seed, source = 1, amplitude = 1 / penalty}

range_select.name: range_select
range_select.expression: clamp(min(input - (from - slope), to + slope - input) / slope, min, max)

range_select_base.name: range_select_base
range_select_base.expression: clamp(min(input - from, to - input) / slope, min, max)

quick_multioctave_noise_persistence.name: quick_multioctave_noise_persistence
quick_multioctave_noise_persistence.expression: quick_multioctave_noise{x = x,y = y,seed0 = seed0,seed1 = seed1,input_scale = input_scale * octave_input_scale_multiplier ^ (octaves - 1),output_scale = output_scale * 2 ^ (octaves - 1),octaves = octaves,octave_output_scale_multiplier = persistence,octave_input_scale_multiplier = 1 / octave_input_scale_multiplier}

amplitude_corrected_multioctave_noise.name: amplitude_corrected_multioctave_noise
amplitude_corrected_multioctave_noise.expression: variable_persistence_multioctave_noise{x = x,y = y,seed0 = seed0,seed1 = seed1,input_scale = input_scale,output_scale = (1 - persistence) / 2 ^ octaves / (1 - persistence ^ octaves) * amplitude,offset_x = offset_x,octaves = octaves,persistence = persistence}

local_expressions.blobs0: basis_noise{x = x, y = y, seed0 = map_seed, seed1 = seed1, input_scale = 1/8, output_scale = 1} + basis_noise{x = x, y = y, seed0 = map_seed, seed1 = seed1, input_scale = 1/24, output_scale = 1}
local_expressions.starting_patches: spot_noise{x = x,y = y,density_expression = starting_amount / (pi * starting_resource_placement_radius * starting_resource_placement_radius) * starting_modulation,spot_quantity_expression = starting_area_spot_quantity,spot_radius_expression = starting_rq_factor * starting_area_spot_quantity ^ (1/3),spot_favorability_expression = clamp((elevation_lakes - 1) / 10, 0, 1) * starting_modulation * 2 - distance / starting_resource_placement_radius + random_penalty_at(0.5, 1),seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = seed1 + 1,skip_span = starting_patch_set_count,skip_offset = starting_patch_set_index,region_size = starting_resource_placement_radius * 2,candidate_spot_count = 32,suggested_minimum_candidate_point_spacing = 32,hard_region_target_quantity = 1,basement_value = basement_value,maximum_spot_basement_radius = 128} + (blobs0 - 0.25) * starting_blob_amplitude
local_expressions.regular_patches: spot_noise{x = x,y = y,density_expression = regular_density_at(distance),spot_quantity_expression = regular_spot_quantity_expression,spot_radius_expression = min(32, regular_rq_factor * regular_spot_quantity_expression ^ (1/3)),spot_favorability_expression = 1,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = seed1,region_size = 1024,candidate_spot_count = candidate_spot_count,suggested_minimum_candidate_point_spacing = 45.254833995939045,skip_span = regular_patch_set_count,skip_offset = regular_patch_set_index,hard_region_target_quantity = 0,basement_value = basement_value,maximum_spot_basement_radius = 128} + (blobs0 + basis_noise{x = x, y = y, seed0 = map_seed, seed1 = seed1, input_scale = 1/64, output_scale = 1.5} - 1/3) * regular_blob_amplitude_at(distance)

regular_density_at.expression: base_density * frequency_multiplier * size_multiplier * if(has_starting_area_placement == -1, 1, clamp((distance - starting_resource_placement_radius) / regular_patch_fade_in_distance, 0, 1)) * (1 + clamp(size_effective_distance_at(distance) / double_density_distance, 0, 1))

make_0_12like_lakes.name: make_0_12like_lakes
make_0_12like_lakes.expression: max(bias + variable_persistence_multioctave_noise{x = x,y = y,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = 1,input_scale = input_scale,output_scale = 0.125,offset_x = offset_x,octaves = terrain_octaves,persistence = persistence},20 + water_level - 0.1 * segmentation_multiplier * distance + variable_persistence_multioctave_noise{x = x,y = y,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = 2,input_scale = input_scale,output_scale = 0.125,offset_x = offset_x,octaves = 6,persistence = persistence})

local_expressions.persistence: clamp(amplitude_corrected_multioctave_noise{x = x,y = y,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = 1,octaves = terrain_octaves - 2,input_scale = input_scale,offset_x = offset_x,persistence = 0.7,amplitude = 0.5} + 0.3,0.1, 0.9)

finish_elevation.name: finish_elevation
finish_elevation.expression: min((elevation - water_level) / segmentation_multiplier,basis_noise{x = x, y = y, seed0 = map_seed, seed1 = 123, input_scale = 1/8, output_scale = 1.5} + starting_lake_distance / 4 - 4,-1 + (starting_lake_distance + starting_lake_noise) / 16,max(2, 2 + starting_lake_distance / 16 + starting_lake_noise / 2))

local_expressions.starting_lake_distance: distance_from_nearest_point{x = x, y = y, points = starting_lake_positions, maximum_distance = 1024}

local_expressions.nauvis_main: elevation_magnitude * (lerp(0.5 * added_cliff_elevation - 0.6,1.9 * added_cliff_elevation + 1.6,0.1 + 0.5 * nauvis_bridges)+ 0.25 * nauvis_detail+ 3 * nauvis_macro * starting_macro_multiplier)
local_expressions.starting_lake_distance: distance_from_nearest_point{x = x, y = y, points = starting_lake_positions, maximum_distance = 1024}

enemy_autoplace_base.name: enemy_autoplace_base
enemy_autoplace_base.expression: random_penalty{x = x + seed,y = y,source = min(enemy_base_probability * max(0, 1 + 0.002 * distance_factor * (-312 * distance_factor - starting_area_radius + distance)),0.25 + distance_factor * 0.05),amplitude = 0.1}

expression_in_range_base.name: expression_in_range_base
expression_in_range_base.expression: expression_in_range(20, 1, aux, moisture, aux_from, moisture_from, aux_to, moisture_to)

rpi.name: rpi
rpi.expression: random_penalty{x = x, y = y, source = 1, amplitude = 1/survival} - 1

decorative_mix_noise.name: decorative_mix_noise
decorative_mix_noise.expression: -0.25+ abs(multioctave_noise{x = x, y = y, persistence = 0.65, seed0 = map_seed, seed1 = seed + 500, octaves = 2, input_scale = input_scale, output_scale = 0.8, offset_y = seed})+ basis_noise{x = x, y = y, seed0 = map_seed, seed1 = seed, input_scale = input_scale, output_scale = 0.1, offset_x = seed}+ basis_noise{x = x, y = y, seed0 = map_seed, seed1 = seed, input_scale = input_scale / 2, output_scale = 0.15, offset_x = seed}+ basis_noise{x = x, y = y, seed0 = map_seed, seed1 = seed, input_scale = input_scale / 4, output_scale = 0.2, offset_x = seed}

vulcanus_detail_noise.name: vulcanus_detail_noise
vulcanus_detail_noise.expression: multioctave_noise{x = x,y = y,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = seed1 + 12243,octaves = octaves,persistence = 0.6,input_scale = 1 / 50 / scale,output_scale = magnitude}

vulcanus_plasma.name: vulcanus_plasma
vulcanus_plasma.expression: abs(basis_noise{x = x,y = y,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = 12643,input_scale = 1 / 50 / scale,output_scale = magnitude1}- basis_noise{x = x,y = y,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = 13423 + seed,input_scale = 1 / 50 / scale2,output_scale = magnitude2})

vulcanus_biome_noise.name: vulcanus_biome_noise
vulcanus_biome_noise.expression: multioctave_noise{x = x,y = y,persistence = 0.65,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = seed1,octaves = 5,input_scale = vulcanus_scale_multiplier / scale}

vulcanus_spot_noise.name: vulcanus_spot_noise
vulcanus_spot_noise.expression: spot_noise{x = x + vulcanus_resource_wobble_x,y = y + vulcanus_resource_wobble_y,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = seed,candidate_spot_count = count,suggested_minimum_candidate_point_spacing = 128,skip_span = span,skip_offset = offset,region_size = region_size,density_expression = density,spot_quantity_expression = quantity,spot_radius_expression = radius,hard_region_target_quantity = 0,spot_favorability_expression = favorability,basement_value = -1,maximum_spot_basement_radius = 128}

local_expressions.metal_spot_noise: vulcanus_spot_noise{seed = seed,count = count,spacing = vulcanus_ore_spacing,span = 3,offset = offset,region_size = 500 + 500 / freq,density = favor_biome * 4,quantity = size * size,radius = size,favorability = favor_biome > 0.9}

vulcanus_place_sulfur_spots.name: vulcanus_place_sulfur_spots
vulcanus_place_sulfur_spots.expression: min(2 * favor_biome - 1, vulcanus_spot_noise{seed = seed,count = count,spacing = vulcanus_ore_spacing,span = 3,offset = offset,region_size = 450 + 450 / freq,density = favor_biome * 4,quantity = size * size,radius = size,favorability = favor_biome > 0.9})

vulcanus_place_non_metal_spots.name: vulcanus_place_non_metal_spots
vulcanus_place_non_metal_spots.expression: min(2 * favor_biome - 1, vulcanus_spot_noise{seed = seed,count = count,spacing = vulcanus_ore_spacing,span = 3,offset = offset,region_size = 400 + 400 / freq,density = favor_biome * 4,quantity = size * size,radius = size,favorability = favor_biome > 0.9})

gleba_select.name: gleba_select
gleba_select.expression: clamp(min(input - (from - slope), to + slope - input) / slope, min, max)

grpi.name: grpi
grpi.expression: random_penalty{x = x, y = y, seed = 1, source = 1, amplitude = 1/survival} - 1

gleba_simple_spot.name: gleba_simple_spot
gleba_simple_spot.expression: spot_noise{x = x + gleba_wobble_small_x * 0.5 * radius,y = y + gleba_wobble_small_y * 0.5 * radius,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = seed1,skip_span = 1,skip_offset = 1,region_size = spacing * 5,density_expression = favorability,spot_favorability_expression = favorability,candidate_spot_count = 22,suggested_minimum_candidate_point_spacing = spacing,spot_quantity_expression = radius * radius,spot_radius_expression = radius,hard_region_target_quantity = 0,basement_value = -1,maximum_spot_basement_radius = radius * 2}

aquilo_spot_noise.name: aquilo_spot_noise
aquilo_spot_noise.expression: spot_noise{x = x,y = y,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = seed,candidate_spot_count = count,suggested_minimum_candidate_point_spacing = 128,skip_span = 3,skip_offset = skip_offset,region_size = region_size,density_expression = density,spot_quantity_expression = radius * radius,spot_radius_expression = radius,hard_region_target_quantity = 0,spot_favorability_expression = favorability,basement_value = -1,maximum_spot_basement_radius = radius * 2}

aquilo_simple_billows.name: aquilo_simple_billows
aquilo_simple_billows.expression: abs(quick_multioctave_noise{x = x,y = y,seed0 = map_seed,seed1 = seed1,input_scale = input_scale,output_scale = 1,offset_x = 10000,octaves = octaves,octave_input_scale_multiplier = 0.5,octave_output_scale_multiplier = 0.75})

autoplace.probability_expression: fulgora_scrap_medium + max(0, fulgora_natural, 2 * fulgora_mesa * fulgora_pyramids) * 2 - 0.9 + fulgora_rock + fulgora_road_dust * fulgora_sprawl
